title: Japanese Noodle Salad
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '3 tablespoons white vinegar', '5 tablespoons chicken stock', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1/2 teaspoon chilli oil', '2 (85g) packets instant noodles', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 cucumber, julienned', '1 carrot, grated', '1 slice cooked ham, cut into thin strips', '1/4 sheet nori, cut into thin slices', '1 tablespoon hot Chinese mustard']
